Artificial Intelligence, Human Capital, and Innovation

Human capital is essential to AI-driven innovation. The scarcity of the human capital needed for AI R&D created an unprecedented brain drain of AI professors from North American universities into the industry between 2004 and 2018. This document provides causal evidence that AI faculty departures from universities reduced the creation of startups by students who then graduated from these universities.
